typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		aluguel_id as integer,
		data_de_aluguel as timestamp,
		inventario_id as integer,
		cliente_id as integer,
		data_de_devolucao as timestamp,
		funcionario_id as byte,
		ultima_atualizacao as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> source1
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> source2
source1, source2 join(cliente_id == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
